channel.title: VenomousX Reborn
channel.description:
[center][url=http://"http://www.allastasia.com"][img]http://i.imgur.com/cf4vUzi.jpg[/img][/url]
VenomousX is an economy server that tries to bring back the many to bring back as many 2011 memories as possible. To do so we have even gone to the effort by creating Runescape shops and scattering them in the Runescape position.
We have given ourselves a challenge to produce and put online a server within the time period of 2 weeks. Which means updates will be compiled and uploaded consistently for the next few months to allow you to watch the server grow from the moment it was built.
This means you are able to receive updates like you received updates in Runescape, e.g. the Introduction of GodWars.
We strive for a player base economy, meaning the players introduce the items. Even if it's a Rune platebody for example!
You can find us at:
Website: [url=http://www.allastasia.com]Allastasia - RuneScape Remake[/url] Forum: [url=http://www.allastasia.com]Allastasia - RuneScape Remake[/url] Play: [url=http://www.allastasia.com/forum/topic/586-play-venomousx/#entry4763]Play VenomousX - News & Announcements - Allastasia - Runescape 2011 Emulation in Development[/url]
Credits go to:
Format Magnito Dementhium Team [/center]

item.title: VenomousX Reborn
item.dc:creator: @ggson ggson
item.description:
@ggson wrote:

wimstr:

Lastly something you created from scratch by yourself.

Are you implying I created none of this myself? I love how you assume that I didn’t write any of the content myself. +1 to you for the incorrect and uneducated guess.

Read full topic

item.title: VenomousX Reborn
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“entrinthy rs, post:7, topic:547723”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=666629.msg4457323#msg4457323 date=1415654392]
‘Unique’

Something not found on other servers.
Something not found on actual Runescape.
Lastly something you created from scratch by yourself.
[/quote]

Nothing unique or different.
Ok, I criticize you to add unique content.

I will recommend you to check the server before you talk.[/quote]

If the allure of the advertisement isn’t enticing enough, why would I expect any different within the actual game? Much less being able to play any other 600+ revision with similar content.

Read full topic

item.title: VenomousX Reborn
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“ggson, post:3, topic:547723”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=666629.msg4457167#msg4457167 date=1415574594]
Nothing unique or different.
[/quote]

I would rather you give me constructive criticism and let me know where i can improve the server, rather than give a blunt fact, which you know was obviously unnecessary.

I would like you to consider that this server has only been developed for approximately 2 weeks now and has had a great deal of fantastic content and will continuously be updated.
But thanks for the reply.[/quote]

Ok, I criticize you to add unique content.

Read full topic

I would like you to consider that this server has only been developed for approximately 2 weeks now and has had a great deal of fantastic content and will continuously be updated.
But thanks for the reply.
